person.persName: Thomas A. Curran (Mason County attorney and postmaster)

body.p: Mason County attorney and postmaster. Harrison County native. Married Hannah Chambers Curran. Captain of U.S. Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Company G 16th Regiment. Dover Postmaster in 1863.
